01/27/11 05:03 PM ET Rep. Mike Pence ( R-Ind.) will not make a bid for the GOP presidential nomination in 2012, telling supporters in a letter that he would rather serve the state of Indiana. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mike Pence wrote, Still, Mike Pence is not officially jumping into the race for Indiana governor just yet. Hydraulic hybrid vehicle technology is one more promising path worth pursuing in the effort to reduce our carbon footprint, and we are excited to partner with the EPA to push forward on this track. EPA's hydraulic hybrid technology, developed in the agency's lab in Ann Arbor is coming into use in large delivery and refuse trucks across the country.
